dcterms:description: The parallel En-De corpus is used for training models in machine translation tasks, allowing for fair comparisons across tasks.
dcterms:title: Parallel En-De corpus

dcterms:description: The CCG Bank is a corpus of CCG derivations and dependency structures extracted from the Penn Treebank, used for syntactic evaluation tasks.
dcterms:title: CCG Bank

dcterms:description: The Penn Treebank is a large annotated corpus of English, used for syntactic analysis and part-of-speech tagging.

dcterms:description: The CCG Bank is a corpus of CCG derivations and dependency structures extracted from the Penn Treebank, used for syntactic evaluation tasks.
